text: Benton City is a village in Audrain County, Missouri, United States. In 2020, 101 people lived there. == History == Benton City was platted in 1881. The village is named after Thomas Hart Benton. == Geography == Benton City is at (39.134798, -91.764443). The United States Census Bureau says that the village has a total area of . All of it is land. == Demographics == === 2020 census === The 2020 census says that there were 101 people, 40 households, and 25 families living in Benton City. == References == Category:Villages in Missouri Category:Settlements in Audrain County, Missouri
title: Benton City, Missouri
